name: Turkish Airlines Euroleague - Enjoy The Flight
description:
Europe's best airline hosts Europe's best basketball players. Enjoy the flight!

It might be a new personal record!!! 54 frames from this film were covered in 4 hours. Thanks to the whole team for making it happen in this short amount of time.

name: FIFA WORLD CUP 2022 QATAR - THE TRACE
description:
Fifa World Cup 2022 - The Trace

Our Fifa World Cup 2022 Qatar film, "The Trace" is out. It was a great honor and privilege for me to work with this amazing, hardworking, and talented crew and cast. I would like to thank everyone who has contributed. It was a great teamwork from the start to the end. I especially want to thank Selim Kemahlı for being involved in the project without even a hesitation and for keeping his energy until the end, Yon Thomas for the amazing cinematography and enthusiasm, and Sofi for all the hard work and sleepless nights even before the project approval. I also want to thank my executive producers Cemil Cem Toparlakli and Burcu Akyildiz for the high energy and support and of course Michael Lynch and Tamer Alzebak for making it happen. It was a great experience throughout. 
 
Client: Supreme Committee for Delivery & Legacy
Production Company: Case Productions UK - Ultramarine Films
Director: Çağlar Mallı

name: İGA Istanbul Airport - Magical Journeys Start Here
description:
This IGA Istanbul Airport film was one of the most challenging projects that I shot. Not only for me but also for the whole crew. We've made this film within two working days. The walking distances, passenger traffic, and the strict airport policies made it very complicated to coordinate on the first day of the shoot at the Istanbul Airport. On the second day, we were all around Istanbul. We came up with this film that we are proud of, and I would easily say that was a hell of an experience.


Client: İGA Istanbul Airport 
Production Company: Digimeb
Director: Çağlar Mallı
Producer: Murat Bayar

name: Şeb-i Arus - Go Türkiye - Director's Cut
description:
For the ''Şeb-i Arus'', we wanted to do something unique. We created this atmospheric mood that suits the philosophy of the whole ceremony. We've written the voice-over according to the inspirational quotes that are believed to be said by Mevlana Celaleddin Rumi. As we didn't have enough source materials to be sure a hundred percent, we've removed the voice-over script from the original film. But, hey, this is the director's cut anyway. 

Production Company: X Film Works
Director: Caglar Malli
Producers: Uluc Kecik, Yakup Incebay, Cansu Hasbay
